sentences.sContent: CPhase(0.01, x) rotates the phase of the |1> component by one one-hundredth of a radian in the complex plane.
sentences.sContent_eng: CPhase(0.01, x) rotates the phase of the |1> component by one one-hundredth of a radian in the complex plane.
sentences.sCn: CPhase(0.01, x) 在复平面内使 |1> 分量的相位转过了百分之一弧度。

sentences.sContent: And if I calculate kappa to the best of my ability, well, I find that kappa should be K four newton-meters per radian.
sentences.sContent_eng: And if I calculate kappa to the best of my ability, well, I find that kappa should be K four newton-meters per radian.
sentences.sCn: 如果我尽最大能力,算出K值，我会发现,会很接近4*10，very，close，to，four，times，ten，to，the，minus,4，每弧度牛顿米。

trans.tranOther: an SI unit of plane angle; the angle between two radii of a circle that cut off on the circumference an arc equal in length to the radius
